metadata.title: CVE-2021-0326 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - high
metadata.description: In p2p_copy_client_info of p2p.c, there is a possible out of bounds writedue to a missing bounds check. This could lead to remote code execution ifthe target device is performing a Wi-Fi Direct search, with no additionalexecution privileges needed. User interaction is not needed forexploitation.Product: AndroidVersions: Android-10 Android-11 Android-8.1Android-9Android ID: A-172937525

criterions.comment: wpa: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
wpa: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
